Description: Worked flint blade, roughly rectangular in shape, unfinished segmented blade, truncated at both short ends, one lateral edge backed. Dull reddish cortex remains on both surfaces - one of them more coarse than the other. Dark red to medium-brown coloured stone, fine-grained.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), Mound ß, surface (X)
